attributes.action: Consider the unfair treatment towards Re-enactment Groups; they promote innocent, legitimate and safe use of Western style, Replica blank firing guns.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the under signed call upon the Prime Minister to correct this unfair situation.
With the VCR Bill in mind. The Scottish Western Re-enactment Association use western style replica blank firing guns and have done so for many years.
We have raised thousands of pounds over the years for different charities and would like to continue to do so.
We are all passionate about our hobby and we spend a lot of money financing it.
The VCR Bill seems to be hitting us more than the criminals.
Criminals will always find a way to be criminals. Re-enactors and fast-draw enthusiasts have no wish to be classed alongside these people.
We now require some sort of Certificate and Register to prove legitimate use and ownership. This may allow us to continue our hobby with the respect we deserve.
When the VCR Bill was discussed it was with the criminal element in mind. Can you now please discuss it with the innocent in mind? Namely Re-enactment Groups.

government_responses.details:
